description:
The journey to Saylague continues. The threesome slips into a touring company that they come across on the road.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pasiune / Ne dăm viaţa de dragul spectacolului?
Passion! Shall We Give Our Lives for the Stage?
Passion! 舞台にかける青春?
Страсть! Не отдать ли молодость театру?
